participant_1.background:
I cherish my sketch book more than anything.
i am also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i work in commercials.
cher from clueless is my idea of perfection.
I am of average weight.

participant_2.background:
My family and I are close, but we live in different states.
I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets.
my mom lives with me.
My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.

content.text: What kind of work do you do?
Wow, that's awesome! What made you want to be a dentist?
I've always loved helping people and teeth are really interesting!
That's a great answer! Do you like your job?
For the most part, yes! It's really rewarding to help people and make them feel better.
I'm glad you enjoy it! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I think my favorite thing is getting to know my patients and build relationships with them.
That's really nice. It seems like you're a good dentist.
My favorite meal is chicken and rice.
That's a classic! Do you have a favorite restaurant that serves it?
I don't really have a favorite restaurant, but I love making it at home!
I'm not a big cook, but I love chicken and rice too!
It's so easy to make! Just cook some rice and chicken and add some vegetables.
I might have to try making it sometime!
You should! It's really easy and delicious!
